recipe.title: Winter Salad with Lemon-Yogurt Dressing
ingredients: 1/4 cup avocado oil or canola oil
8 cups coarsely chopped romaine lettuce (about 8 large leaves)
2 small carrots, thinly sliced into rounds
1 cup 1/2-inch cubes peeled kohlrabi or peeled broccoli stems
instructions: Whisk first 5 ingredients in small bowl. Season dressing to taste with sea salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Salad: Toss lettuce and next 8 ingredients in large bowl. Add dressing and toss to coat. Divide salad among plates; sprinkle with sunflower seeds.
